releaseNotes:
Strap yourselves in for a major update! This version brings a complete app redesign.
Here is what’s new:
• Convenient main screen—all features, content, and artwork examples are now gathered in one place
• Chat-like art generator—send multiple prompts at once and have your generations stored in the chat history
• Christmas content—generate festive artwork, avatars, and selfies to embrace the holiday magic

We love getting feedback from you! Please leave your reviews so we can keep making the app even better.
description:
Want to create mesmerizing artwork? Or looking for a way to visualize your wildest ideas? 

Meet AI Arta—your personal AI-powered art studio designed to turn your ideas into breathtaking works of art. Discover a world of limitless creativity and explore its boundless possibilities:

► Turn words into art
Want to see a BBQ party on Mars or a group of cats having a tea ceremony? Or maybe you're wondering what lies in the far corners of our universe? AI Art can show you all that and more! 

Trained with millions of images from the Web, this powerful generator will transform your dreams into visual art in a matter of seconds! Simply type in what you have on your mind, and the AI will generate remarkable pictures that match your description.

► Reimagine your videos
Want to bring your idea to life through a video? Simply upload a video, and our AI will transform it into a mesmerizing clip that blurs the lines between fantasy and reality. Explore a wide variety of templates to feel like a hero of a breathtaking magical scenario, futuristic cyberpunk world, exciting anime universe, and beyond!

► Explore art styles
AI Arta has mastered a variety of art styles and techniques: from cartoonish pencil sketches to mind-blowing photorealism. Experiment with styles and see which one captures your idea best.

► Create art from images
If you have an exact concept of what your painting should look like, you may add an image as the visual base for your prompt. Upload a photo or select one from our library, and the AI will transform it into a masterpiece tailored to your vision. Try out different inputs to see your ideas from different angles!

► Generate avatars
Take your selfies to the next level using AI magic. Upload your photos to generate your portraits in various settings, eras, and styles. Try on the roles of an epic comic-style superhero, a cool cyborg from the future, a 90s rock star, and more.

► Get inspired
Get an extra boost of inspiration browsing a gallery of amazing images generated by AI artists from all over the world. Explore the ideas of others and get your creative juices flowing!

You can enable a free trial to access the features included in the subscription.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to get unlimited access to certain app features.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
All personal data is protected in accordance with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:
https://aiby.mobi/ai_art_ios/privacy
https://aiby.mobi/ai_art_ios/terms
